Html.content:
Here you find several subpages that are useful to handle the documentation:

  • Editing the documentation: Gives hints on how to document things and on how to use the documentation-specific content types.
  • Todos: Here you see all the TODOs that are open in the documentation
  • Screenshot review: Here you can check if all screenshots are up-to-date for the documentation's version, replace screenshots or simply mark them as up-to-date
  • Content sanitizers: They allow to
    • touch each content, sanitize it and store it again. (This is useful to update topic and section title properties, or if the structure of a content should have changed.)
    • delete unused contents, as for example may remain when you delete a section, but not the contents that were placed in the section.
